## alertHidden() function

Gets indication whether hide alerts or not for control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function alertHidden(form: NgForm, control: string, errors?: string[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | <code>NgForm</code> | Form containing controls |
|  control | <code>string</code> | Controls name that will be checked |
|  errors | <code>string[]</code> | Array of validation errors to be checked for existance |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
